mapper.select: select solution.question_id,content,point from solution join question on solution.question_id=question.question_id where student_id=#{studentId} and question.option_a is null
mapper.insert: insert into solution (student_id , paper_id , question_id , content,pic_path,isright) values (#{studentId},#{paperId},#{questionId},#{solutionContent},#{picPath},#{isRight})
mapper.update: update solution set content=#{solutionContent} where student_id=#{studentId} AND paper_id=#{paperId} AND question_id=#{questionId}
update solution set point=#{point},isright=#{isright},content=#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where student_id=#{studentId} and paper_id=#{paperId} and question_id=#{questionId}
